epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features.
epics.description: Develop a secure login mechanism that includes multi-factor authentication to ensure that only authorized users can access the banking portal. This epic includes creating secure user sessions and managing secure storage of user credentials and session keys.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for users.
epics.description: Develop a user-friendly, customizable dashboard that displays relevant banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. This dashboard should provide users with an overview of their accounts, transactions, and other financial activities.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modifications
epics.summary: Enable users to submit account opening requests and service modifications.
epics.description: Implement streamlined workflows that allow users to submit new account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. This includes forms for data entry, validation, and submission, along with workflows for approval and processing of these requests.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Develop a responsive design for the portal.
epics.description: Ensure that the portal is responsive and provides a consistent user experience across various devices, including desktop, tablet, and mobile phones. This involves implementing adaptive layouts and testing on different screen sizes and operating systems.

epics.title: Real-time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications.
epics.description: Develop features to provide users with real-time status updates on their requests and transactions, along with email notifications. This ensures users are kept informed about the progress of their submissions and any necessary actions they need to take.

epics.title: Interaction History and Documentation Upload
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive interaction history and enable document uploads.
epics.description: Implement functionality to keep a detailed history of user interactions within the portal. Additionally, develop features to allow users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface, ensuring that users can save and resume incomplete applications.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system.
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the self-service portal with the bank's existing core banking system. This involves developing secure APIs, data synchronization mechanisms, and maintaining a separate database to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access control to ensure that users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. This includes defining roles, permissions, and access policies tailored to different types of users.

user_stories.title: Implement Secure Login Mechanism
user_stories.description: As an end-user, I want to log in securely using multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure my account is only accessed by authorized individuals.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must support multi-factor authentication (email/SMS verification). Ensure secure session management.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User enters login credentials and receives a multi-factor authentication prompt.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an end-user, when logging in with valid credentials, then receive and complete a multi-factor authentication prompt.

user_stories.title: Manage Secure User Sessions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my session to be securely managed, so that my account activities are protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Sessions must expire after a period of inactivity. Re-authentication required after timeout.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User session expires after inactivity, prompting re-authentication.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an active user session, when inactive for a set time, then prompt the user to re-authenticate.

user_stories.title: Secure Storage of Credentials
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want user credentials to be securely stored, so that sensitive information is protected against breaches.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use encryption for storing user credentials and session keys.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User credentials are encrypted in storage.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user credentials, when stored, then they must be encrypted.

user_stories.title: Develop Customizable Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a customizable dashboard, so that I can view my relevant banking products and services easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should reflect user profile and preferences.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can customize the dashboard to display relevant banking information.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user profile, when accessing the dashboard, then see relevant banking products and services.

user_stories.title: View Account Overview
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see an overview of my accounts on my dashboard, so that I can easily monitor my financial status.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Display summary of all accounts with key details.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User sees account balances and transactions on the dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user accounts, when logged in, then see a summary of accounts on the dashboard.

user_stories.title: Display Transaction History
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to view my recent transactions, so that I can keep track of my financial activities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide a list of recent transactions on the dashboard.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can view a list of recent transactions on the dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given recent transactions, when logged in, then see a list of transactions on the dashboard.

user_stories.title: Submit New Account Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to submit a new account opening request, so that I can create a new banking account easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Form for new account requests with validation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can successfully submit a new account request.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new account form, when filled and submitted, then the request is processed.

user_stories.title: Modify Existing Services
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify my existing banking services, so that I can update my banking preferences.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide form for service modification with approval workflows.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can modify existing services with approval process.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a service modification form, when submitted, then the request follows approval workflows.

user_stories.title: Validate Service Modification Requests
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to validate service modification requests, so that I can ensure they meet all required criteria before approval.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Validate submission forms for required information and approval criteria.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Service modification requests are validated before processing.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a service modification request, when submitted, then validate required information and criteria.

user_stories.title: Develop Adaptive Layouts
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to adapt its layout depending on my device, so that I have a consistent user experience across all devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Adaptive layouts for desktop, tablet, and mobile with optimized UX.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal layout adapts to the device being used.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, when accessing the portal, then the layout adapts accordingly.

user_stories.title: Test on Various Devices
user_stories.description: As a QA tester, I want to test the portal on various devices, so that I can ensure consistent user experience across all screen sizes and operating systems.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Test on multiple devices and operating systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal passes tests on multiple devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, when accessing the portal, then consistent user experience is verified.

user_stories.title: Implement Optimized Interactions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want optimized interactions for mobile devices, so that I can have a seamless experience using touch inputs.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Optimize interactions for touch inputs.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Interactions are optimized for touch inputs.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a mobile device, when using the portal, then interactions are optimized for touch.

user_stories.title: Real-time Request Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I am informed about the progress without delay.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement real-time status tracking for requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Updates are displayed in real-time for submitted requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a submitted request, when checked, then status updates are shown in real-time.

user_stories.title: Email Notifications for Actions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive email notifications for actions required in my requests, so that I don't miss necessary steps.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Email notifications for any required user actions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Notifications are sent for required user actions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user action required, when it occurs, then send an email notification.

user_stories.title: Notify User of Request Completion
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be notified upon the completion of my requests, so that I can take any necessary next steps.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Notify user once their request is completed.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User is notified when their request is completed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a completed request, when finished, then notify the user.

user_stories.title: Maintain User Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a detailed history of my interactions, so that I can track previous actions and decisions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Log and display all user interactions within the portal.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can view a detailed history of interactions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given previous user interactions, when viewed, then a detailed history is displayed.

user_stories.title: Enable Document Uploads
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload necessary documents, so that I can support my requests and applications.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support for uploading various document types.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User is able to upload documents successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a need for documentation, when uploading, then the document is successfully stored.

user_stories.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save and resume my incomplete applications, so that I can complete them at a later time.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow saving progress and resuming later.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Incomplete applications can be saved and resumed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when saved, then it can be resumed later.

user_stories.title: Develop Secure APIs for Integration
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want secure APIs for integrating with the core banking system, so that data exchange is secure and reliable.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement secure API endpoints for data exchange.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: APIs are secure and facilitate reliable data integration.
user_stories.test_cases: Given API endpoints, when used, then data exchange is secure and reliable.

user_stories.title: Ensure Data Synchronization
user_stories.description: As an integration engineer, I want to ensure data synchronization between the portal and core banking system, so that data consistency is maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement mechanisms for consistent data synchronization.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data is consistently synchronized between systems.
user_stories.test_cases: Given data updates, when occurring, then systems remain synchronized.

user_stories.title: Maintain Separate Data Stores for Performance
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to maintain separate data stores for the portal, so that performance and reliability are ensured without affecting the core banking system.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use separate databases for the portal without impacting core system.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Separate data stores are used to ensure optimal performance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, when operating, then it uses separate data stores for reliability.

user_stories.title: Define User Roles and Permissions
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to define user roles and permissions, so that access is restricted based on profile and authorization level.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Define roles and corresponding permissions for users.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Roles and permissions are defined and enforced.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user roles, when accessing the portal, then permissions are enforced accordingly.

user_stories.title: Implement Access Policies
user_stories.description: As an IT security manager, I want to implement access policies, so that user access is regulated based on their roles and permissions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Access policies should regulate user access.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Access policies are implemented and regulate user access effectively.
user_stories.test_cases: Given access policies, when users access the portal, then access is regulated.

user_stories.title: Audit Role-Based Access Activities
user_stories.description: As an auditor, I want to track and audit role-based access activities, so that I can ensure compliance and security.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Track all access activities based on roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Role-based access activities are tracked and auditable.
user_stories.test_cases: Given role-based access activities, when logged, then they can be audited.

architecture_generation.description: AWS architecture aligned to equivalent service mappings.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been validated and enhanced to ensure all nodes and edges are consistent, unique, and complete. Placeholder nodes were added for missing references, and duplicate IDs were resolved. The architecture now adheres to the Azure Well-Architected Framework with improved security, reliability, and operational excellence. Quality rating: High.
